name: capy hoky
description:
Capybara ice-hockey! A simple and fun sports game for everyone. Play your (real or AI) friends in versus mode, or team up to compete in the Capy Cup. Unlock new animals, score sick goals and have fun!

Features

  • Capy Cup (1-2 players co-op)
  • Versus (1-4 players)
  • 5 unlockable characters

Controls

Supports up to 2 keyboard inputs and/or up to 4 controllers.

  • Keyboard (1p): arrow keys to run, enter to confirm, hold Z or X to swing
  • Controllers: left stick to run, start to confirm, triggers to swing
  • Best played with a controller!

    based on the unreleased 2014 original 'capy hoky'


    Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
    Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
